title: Competition Achievements
description: Demonstrated exceptional problem-solving and algorithmic proficiency through participation in international and national computer science competitions.
achievements: 5th place in Prologin 2023 out of approximately 2,000 participants
Now responsible for designing contest exercises
1st place in Match'Up Coding Battle (formerly Le Shaker) 2020 among more than 500,000 participants
Part of the INSA team representing at European level for SWERC/ICPC (2024, 2025)
Honed advanced algorithmic thinking, code optimization, and programming efficiency under time constraints
Represented INSA Lyon at the national level and built professional networking connections in the competitive programming community
Developed resilience, strategic thinking, and time management skills in high-pressure competitive environments

title: VR Research Intern at Suwa University
description: Conducted a 2-month research internship at Suwa University on behavioral changes in virtual reality, focusing on experimental design and data analysis in an interdisciplinary team environment.
achievements: Conducted 2-month research internship on behavioral changes in virtual reality
Designed and executed VR experiments to study user behavior and psychological impacts of immersive technologies
Analyzed experimental data using statistical methods, identifying key behavioral patterns and correlations
Collaborated with psychologists and engineers in interdisciplinary research projects on VR applications
Developed VR prototypes using Unity for research simulations and user testing
Presented research findings at university symposiums, contributing to academic discussions on VR technology

title: Volunteer & Community Leader at INSAlgo & Tech Communities
description: Active member and organizer in tech communities, leading initiatives to foster learning, collaboration, and professional development in computer science and programming.
